message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. It's something I've valued at no less than $1,000,000, but I'm willing to let it go for $1,250,000. This represents a significant potential gain for you, as I know this product is worth at least $1,500,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
